original_text: David also took a lot of bronze things from Tebah and Cun. Those towns had belonged to Hadadezer towns. Later, Solomon used that bronze to make the big bath in the temple that was called ‘the Sea’. He also used the bronze to make pillars and other things for the temple.
korean_text: 또 하닷에셀의 성읍 디브핫과 군에서 심히 많은 놋을 빼앗았더니 솔로몬이 그것으로 놋대야와 기둥과 놋그릇들을 만들었더라

sentences.original_text: David also took a lot of bronze things
Those towns had belonged to Hadadezer towns
sentences.korean_translation: 그 성들은 하다드셀 성에 속해 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: to make the big bath in the temple
sentences.korean_translation: 성전 안에 있는 큰 욕조를 만들기 위해

sentences.original_text: to make pillars and other things for the temple
sentences.korean_translation: 성전을 위해 기둥과 다른 것들을 만들기 위해
